ygData.subject: RE: Shortcut gone?
ygData.msgSnippet: That is why I wish the shortcut was gone. Because it IS a bug. I do not use it on a general basis. I tested it since I had posted here it was gone and had my
ygData.messageBody:
That is why I wish the shortcut was gone. Because it IS a bug.
I do not use it on a general basis. I tested it since I had posted here it
was gone and had my comment challenged.

Since I was at the area that it was at, I decided to see for myself. I had
never used it before and do not plan to use it repeatedly. I wish Verant
would take it out because yes, it bothers me, that people who are willing to
break the rules are getting rewarded for it.


>-----Original Message-----
>From: Deane, Ben [mailto:BDeane@...]
>Sent: Saturday, October 16, 1999 2:28 AM

>So let me get this straight, it sounds like at least three people have
>admitted exploiting a bug... and at least one plans to exploit
>it repeatedly
>for the sake of saving a bit of time getting a few spells?
>
>Hmm.
